Name: Buffalo Chicken
Desc: Crispy chicken, scallions, mozzarella, and blue cheese.
Name: Joe's Original Burger
Desc: A half pound of U.S.D.A. top choice beef ground fresh. Served on a toasted poppy seed bun and accompanied by fresh hand-cut fries, onion ring garnish, lettuce, tomato, and deli pickle. Add cheese for an additional charge.
Name: Joe's Au Poivre Burger
Desc: A half pound of U.S.D.A. top choice beef ground fresh, coated with peppercorns, and topped with caramelized onions and melted cheddar. Served on a toasted poppy seed bun and accompanied by fresh hand-cut fries, onion ring garnish, lettuce, tomato and deli
Name: Bacon Cheeseburger
Desc: A half pound of U.S.D.A. top choice beef ground fresh and topped with crisp bacon and aged cheddar cheese. Served on a toasted poppy seed bun and accompanied by fresh hand-cut fries, onion ring garnish, lettuer, tomato and deli pickle.
Name: Black and Blue Burger
Desc: U.S.D.A. top choice beef pan blackened, blue cheese, roasted red peppers, scallions, and caramelized onions. Served on a toasted poppy seed bun and accompanied by fresh hand-cut fries, onion ring garnish, lettuce, tomato, and deli pickle.
Name: Mushroom Provolone Burger
Desc: U.S.D.A. top choice beef topped with fresh sauteed mushrooms and melted provolone cheese. Served on a toasted poppy seed bun and accompanied by fresh hand-cut fries, onion ring garnish, lettuce, tomato, and deli pickle.
Name: Fresh Turkey Burger
Desc: Perfectly seasoned ground turkey on a toasted honey-wheat roll with spicy 1000 Island sauce. Served with sweet potato fries.
Name: Sesame Ahi Tuna Burger
Desc: Served on a griddled multigrain roll with sesame seeds, wasabi aioli, and sweet potato fries.
Name: The Chicken Club
Desc: sliced chicken breast and crisp bacon on toasted multi-grain bread with lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise. Served with fresh hand-cut fries and an onion ring garnish.
Name: Classic Reuben

Name: French Dip

Name: Not So Simple Grilled Cheese
